item.description: The South Windsor Jaycees are hosting their 2nd annual Halloween Pancake Breakfast on Sunday, October 24th! Come out with the family and enjoy pancakes (including our famous pumpkin pancakes!) , sausage, juice and more all for the great price of free! That’s right, there is no charge but, the Jaycees are asking for donations for the South Windsor Food & Fuel Bank in conjunction with our annual Thanksgiving Baskets for the Needy project that provides more than 100 less fortunate families in South Windsor with a lovely Thanksgiving dinner. In addition to having a great breakfast there will be crafts for the kids and holiday photo opportunities. Children are welcome to wear costumes. The Jaycees want you to plan on joining us for breakfast on Sunday, October 24th from 8 a.m. – noon at Fire Department Company 1 at 1175 Ellington Road in South Windsor. No reservations are needed. Volunteers needed 7 a.m. - 1 p.m.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Caroline at the greeting desk
item.name: 2nd Annual Halloween Pancake Breakfast
